title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
General Considerations

For Task A, the response identifies the constitutional clause that is most relevant to both Brown v. Board of Education of Topeka and Parents Involved in Community Schools v. Seattle School District No. 1.

For Task B1, the response must describe correct information from the required Supreme Court case.

For Task B2, the response must explain how the similarity in facts led to similar holdings in both cases.

Task B is worth 2 points. If the response accomplishes the task in B1, the response will earn 1 point. If the response accomplishes the task in B2, the response will earn 2 points.

For Task C, the response must explain how sharp disagreements about how race can be used in school-assignment plans can occur on the Supreme Court.
descriptions: The responses accomplish none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the following tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any TWO of Tasks A, B1, or C or just Task B2.
The response accomplishes Tasks A, B1, and C or Task B2 and A, or Task B2 and C.
The response accomplishes Tasks A, B2, and C.
